title: Static Analysis

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
App creates temp file. Sensitive information should never be written into a temp file.
Insecure WebView Implementation. Execution of user controlled code in WebView is a critical Security Hole.
metadata.cwe: CWE-749 Exposed Dangerous Method or Function
CWE-327 Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
metadata.description: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['camera', 'network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

FCS_COP.1.1(2).choice: The application perform cryptographic hashing services not in accordance with FCS_COP.1.1(2) and uses the cryptographic algorithm RC2/RC4/MD4/MD5.

FPT_TUD_EXT.2.1.choice: The application shall be distributed using the format of the platform-supported package manager.

strings: "cnfExit" : "Are you sure you want to exit?"

playstore_details.title: Vidulum - Multi-Asset Cryptocurrency Wallet
playstore_details.description:
Vidulum, is a digital asset wallet that supports multiple cryptocurrencies and is accessible online through any modern web browser. With a focus on ease of use and functionality, the Vidulum team is dedicated to driving adoption while tearing down the barriers of entry. Users of the Vidulum App can be rewarded through the V-Staking system daily, by simply holding a v-rewards supported cryptocurrency. VDL is the native cryptocurrency that users will receive through the V-Staking System. VDL is Proof of Work and supports Masternodes.

As a multi-asset web wallet, users are in full control of their private keys and are encouraged to ensure that they have secured their accounts with a strong password, unique username and pin. Further it is encouraged that users enable 2-factor authentication. The Vidulum team is unable to retrieve account credentials, by design, and this means that only you can access your account, making it critical that you do not lose your credentials and take a back up of your private keys, storing them securely.
playstore_details.summary: Vidulum, is a multi-asset crypto wallet where you control your private keys.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Vidulum, is a multi-asset crypto wallet where you control your private keys.
